Nerd - is the evidence of the professor’s concern for his wards. This Saiga version was purchased specifically for personnel. Used in "negotiations" with especially dangerous mutants about the transfer of their organs as a gift to science .. Experienced hunters look with considerable envy at the "nerds" armed with this model.

 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All Red Dot scopes for Dovetail mount.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: PBS-1 suppressor

Saiga modified by mercs request. Picatinny rail and a massive muzzle brake compensator installed, significantly reducing recoil.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All Red Dot scopes for picatinny/weaver and for Dovetail mount except of OKP-7, Kobra EKP-1S-03, Kobra EKP-8-02.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: NATO suppressor

A model developed by Kalashnikov USA on the basis of the Komrad 12 semi-automatic rifle for hunting and protecting members of ISG research teams from mutants. The weapon has both a dovetail mount and a picatinny bar for use with various types of sights. This model has a new type of trigger mechanism , which allows you to two rounds burst.
